item.title: Four
item.description:
Testing by creating /post/four/index.md instead of /post/four.md. Trying to see which uniformity flows. Logo

Logo works with /img/. Need to get logo working from within content folder The above image works when I set image location to /post/four/cramp.png

Image from directly within the container folder: - Works on Hugo Server. Lets see which works when publishing online.
